messages.messageBody:
_http://www.shariahprogram.ca/_ (http://www.shariahprogram.ca/)

This is a school out of Toronto. It was one of the links in an e-mail I got
today that wasn't really about unschooling (was about homeschooling in
general), but I clicked all the links and this one is really pretty cool.

Even if one's not interested in signing up for one of their distance or
in-person programs, the website is pretty and interesting, and in my life it
seems when I learn something kind of obscure and new this way, within just a
couple or three months, someone will ask "So... do you know anywhere that
does...[whatever it is]."

So now you all know where people can learn Arabic and study Islam from home
even if they're in Kansas or somewhere non-Mosquesque.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
